Subject: iphone USB connect allowed
Description: WE have the setting set to allow for power only when an iPhone is connected, but when trying it out recently we have found that when an iPhone is connected it allows you to browse the storage of the USB, this is restricted to the camera roll, but does allow a user to download files from an iPhone to the PC. We need to stop this but still allow charging for iPhones,
What_We_Know__c:
Client is trying to block the ability for iOS devices to just allow them to charge but he's facing an issue where it allows to download files from iPhone to PC. 

Asked to take a look at the computer rights and see if the device has the deny access but allow charging.
Next_Steps__c:
Asked to take a look at the computer rights and see if the device has the deny access but allow charging.

Awaiting for the response.
Solution_Comment__c:
Known limitation.
RD constantly working on improving the technical limitations.
Closing ticket as advised.
